Re: List Players that need to be created

If anyone is interested in the Swedish Elitserien: Here are a first transfer update, where I have listed all the transfers I found so far and which players that needs to be CAP and moved to and from FA-list. The next thing for me will be to go through the teams and look for players that I´ve missed in this first update and need to be removed and then make some necessary CAP:s.

BRYNÄS

+ Markus Korhonen, g, CAP

+ Markus Kakanperä, d, Jokerit

+ Pavel Brendl, f, Mora

+ Juuso Hietanen, f, CAP

+ Alexander Sundstrom, f, CAP
